item.title: A Fragment Colocation Pattern with React & Apollo GraphQL
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: When working with complex GraphQL schemas, it’s common to have shared fields across different types. A fragment colocation pattern allows us to define fragments alongside their corresponding components, resulting in a more cohesive and maintainable codebase.
